title: Quantitative methods in corpus linguistics
text:
Preface
This collection of handouts provides a hands-on introduction to data analysis and statistical methods in quantitative corpus linguistics with R.
It is geared primarily towards students attending the classes Language Variation (BA) and Statistics for Linguistics (MA) as well as those currently working on their BA/MA/PhD theses in empirical linguistics.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.

1 + 1

title: 2  Summary
text:
In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.
